title: Secure Context
summary: A secure context is a Window or Worker in which certain minimum standards of authentication and confidentiality are met. Many Web APIs and features are only accessible in secure contexts, reducing the opportunity for misuse by malicious code.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
